title: Greater Albion Releases Chiara Script and Svengali Roman
content: Greater Albion's two latest faces, Chiara Script and Svengali Roman have been released today on [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203014130/http:/new.myfonts.com/foundry/Greater_Albion_Typefounders/). I've also just uploaded previews of both faces 'in action' on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203014130/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
author: Rasendyll
